00061 namespace {
00062   const char *DEFAULT_HOST = "localhost";
00063   const int DEFAULT_PORT = 11255;
00064   const int DEFAULT_TIMEOUT = 10000;
00065   const char *usage[] = {
00066     "usage: sampleClient [OPTIONS] <input-file>",
00067     "",
00068     "OPTIONS:",
00069     "  --host=<name>   Specifies the host to connect to (default = localhost)",
00070     "  --port=<n>      Specifies the port to connect to (default = 11255)",
00071     "  --reactors=<n>  Specifies the number of reactors (default=1)",
00072     "  --recv-addr=<addr>  Let the server connect to us by listening for",
00073     "                  connection request on <addr> (host:port).  The address",
00074     "                  that the server is connecting from should be the same",
00075     "                  as in --host and --port or the defaults.",
00076     "                  (TCP only)",
00077     "  --timeout=<t>   Connection timeout in milliseconds (default=10000)",
00078     "  --verbose       Generate verbose output",
00079     "  --udp           Operate in UDP mode instead of TCP",
00080     "",
00081     "This is a sample program to test the AsyncComm library.  It establishes",
00082     "a connection with the sampleServer and sends each line of the input file",
00083     "to the server.  Each reply from the server is echoed to stdout.",
00084     (const char *)0
00085   };
00086   bool g_verbose = false;
00087 }

00096 class ResponseHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00097 
00098 public:
00099 
00100   ResponseHandler() : m_queue(), m_mutex(), m_cond() { return; }
00101   virtual ~ResponseHandler() { return; }
00102 
00103   virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) = 0;
00104 
00105   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &event_ptr) = 0;
00106 
00107 protected:
00108   queue<EventPtr>   m_queue;
00109   Mutex             m_mutex;
00110   boost::condition  m_cond;
00111 };

00123 class ResponseHandlerTCP : public ResponseHandler {
00124 
00125 public:
00126 
00127   ResponseHandlerTCP() : ResponseHandler(), m_connected(false) { return; }
00128 
00129   virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00130     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00131     if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00132       if (g_verbose)
00133         HT_INFOF("Connection Established - %s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00134       m_connected = true;
00135       m_cond.notify_one();
00136     }
00137     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00138       if (event_ptr->error != 0) {
00139         HT_INFOF("Disconnect : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00140       }
00141       else {
00142         HT_INFO("Disconnect.");
00143       }
00144       m_connected = false;
00145       m_cond.notify_one();
00146     }
00147     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00148       HT_INFOF("Error : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00149       //exit(1);
00150     }
00151     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00152       m_queue.push(event_ptr);
00153       m_cond.notify_one();
00154     }
00155   }
00156 
00157   bool wait_for_connection() {
00158     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00159     if (m_connected)
00160       return true;
00161     m_cond.wait(lock);
00162     return m_connected;
00163   }
00164 
00165   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00166     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00167     while (m_queue.empty()) {
00168       if (m_connected == false)
00169         return false;
00170       m_cond.wait(lock);
00171     }
00172     event_ptr = m_queue.front();
00173     m_queue.pop();
00174     return true;
00175   }
00176 
00177 private:
00178   bool m_connected;
00179 };
00180

00187 class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00188 public:
00189   HandlerFactory(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00190     m_dispatch_handler_ptr = dhp;
00191   }
00192   virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00193     dhp = m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00194   }
00195 private:
00196   DispatchHandlerPtr m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00197 };

00207 class ResponseHandlerUDP : public ResponseHandler {
00208 
00209 public:
00210 
00211   ResponseHandlerUDP() : ResponseHandler() { return; }
00212 
00213   virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00214     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00215     if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00216       m_queue.push(event_ptr);
00217       m_cond.notify_one();
00218     }
00219     else {
00220       HT_INFOF("%s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00221       //exit(1);
00222     }
00223   }
00224 
00225   virtual bool get_response(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00226     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00227     while (m_queue.empty()) {
00228       m_cond.wait(lock);
00229     }
00230     event_ptr = m_queue.front();
00231     m_queue.pop();
00232     return true;
00233   }
00234 };

00243 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00244   Comm *comm;
00245   int rval;
00246   const char *host = DEFAULT_HOST;
00247   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00248   uint16_t port = DEFAULT_PORT;
00249   time_t timeout = DEFAULT_TIMEOUT;
00250   int reactor_count = 1;
00251   const char *in_file = 0;
00252   int error;
00253   EventPtr event_ptr;
00254   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfp;
00255   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp;
00256   ResponseHandler *resp_handler;
00257   bool udp_mode = false;
00258   string line;
00259   int outstanding = 0;
00260   int max_outstanding = 50;
00261   const char *str;
00262   struct sockaddr_in local_addr;
00263 
00264   Config::init(0, 0);
00265 
00266   memset(&local_addr, 0, sizeof(local_addr));
00267 
00268   if (argc == 1)
00269     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00270 
00271   System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00272   ReactorFactory::initialize(1);
00273 
00274   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00275     if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--host=", 7))
00276       host = &argv[i][7];
00277     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7)) {
00278       rval = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00279       if (rval <= 1024 || rval > 65535) {
00280         cerr << "Invalid port.  Must be in the range of 1024-65535." << endl;
00281         exit(1);
00282       }
00283       port = rval;
00284     }
00285     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--timeout=", 10))
00286       timeout = (time_t)atoi(&argv[i][10]);
00287     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--udp"))
00288       udp_mode = true;
00289     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--reactors=", 11))
00290       reactor_count = atoi(&argv[i][11]);
00291     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--recv-addr=", 12)) {
00292       if (!InetAddr::initialize(&local_addr, &argv[i][12]))
00293         HT_ABORT;
00294     }
00295     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose")) {
00296       g_verbose = true;
00297     }
00298     else if (in_file == 0)
00299       in_file = argv[i];
00300     else
00301       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00302   }
00303 
00304   if (in_file == 0)
00305     Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00306 
00307   if (!InetAddr::initialize(&addr, host, port))
00308     exit(1);
00309 
00310   comm = Comm::instance();
00311 
00312   ifstream myfile(in_file);
00313 
00314   if (!myfile.is_open()) {
00315     HT_ERRORF("Unable to open file '%s' : %s", in_file, strerror(errno));
00316     return 0;
00317   }
00318 
00319   if (udp_mode) {
00320     assert(local_addr.sin_port == 0);
00321     resp_handler = new ResponseHandlerUDP();
00322     dhp = resp_handler;
00323     port++;
00324     InetAddr::initialize(&local_addr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00325     comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&local_addr, 0, dhp);
00326   }
00327   else {
00328     resp_handler = new ResponseHandlerTCP();
00329     dhp = resp_handler;
00330 
00331     if (local_addr.sin_port == 0) {
00332       if ((error = comm->connect(addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00333         HT_ERRORF("Comm::connect error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00334         exit(1);
00335       }
00336     }
00337     else {
00338       chfp = new HandlerFactory(dhp);
00339       comm->listen(local_addr, chfp, dhp);
00340     }
00341     if (!((ResponseHandlerTCP *)resp_handler)->wait_for_connection())
00342       exit(1);
00343 
00344   }
00345 
00346   CommHeader header;
00347   const uint8_t *decode_ptr;
00348   size_t decode_remain;
00349 
00350   while (!myfile.eof()) {
00351     getline (myfile,line);
00352     if (line.length() > 0) {
00353       CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(header, encoded_length_str16(line)));
00354       cbp->append_str16(line);
00355       int retries = 0;
00356 
00357       if (udp_mode) {
00358         if ((error = comm->send_datagram(addr, local_addr, cbp)) != Error::OK) {
00359           HT_ERRORF("Problem sending datagram - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00360           return 1;
00361         }
00362       }
00363       else {
00364         while ((error = comm->send_request(addr, timeout, cbp, resp_handler))
00365                 != Error::OK) {
00366           if (error == Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED) {
00367             if (retries == 5) {
00368               HT_ERROR("Connection timeout.");
00369               return 1;
00370             }
00371             poll(0, 0, 1000);
00372             retries++;
00373           }
00374           else {
00375             HT_ERRORF("CommEngine::send_message returned '%s'",
00376                       Error::get_text(error));
00377             return 1;
00378           }
00379         }
00380       }
00381       outstanding++;
00382 
00383       if (outstanding  > max_outstanding) {
00384         if (!resp_handler->get_response(event_ptr))
00385           break;
00386         try {
00387           decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload;
00388           decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len;
00389           str = decode_str16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00390           if (*str != 0)
00391             cout << "ECHO: " << str << endl;
00392           else
00393             cout << "[NULL]" << endl;
00394         }
00395         catch (Exception &e) {
00396           cout <<"Error: "<< e << endl;
00397         }
00398         outstanding--;
00399       }
00400     }
00401   }
00402 
00403   while (outstanding > 0 && resp_handler->get_response(event_ptr)) {
00404     try {
00405       decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload;
00406       decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len;
00407       str = decode_str16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00408       if (str != 0)
00409         cout << "ECHO: " << str << endl;
00410       else
00411         cout << "[NULL]" << endl;
00412     }
00413     catch (Exception &e) {
00414       cout <<"Error: "<< e << endl;
00415     }
00416     //cout << "out = " << outstanding << endl;
00417     outstanding--;
00418   }
00419 
00420 
00421   myfile.close();
00422 
00423   ReactorFactory::destroy();
00424 
00425   return 0;
00426 }
